►►► This video ◄◄◄  

This week the EU gave a pass to iMessage, Zuckerberg said the Apple Vision Pro is worse than the Meta Quest 3 and I think he is both right & wrong and OpenAI revealed Sora, the insanely impressive video generation AI.

Episode 185
